channel.title: Posts on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo

item.title: Nouvel Article 1
item.description: “Peace of mind produces right values, right values produce right thoughts. Right thoughts produce right actions and right actions produce work which will be a material reflection for others to see of the serenity at the center of it all.” ― Robert M. Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance

item.title: Nouvel Article 2
item.description: “Peace of mind produces right values, right values produce right thoughts. Right thoughts produce right actions and right actions produce work which will be a material reflection for others to see of the serenity at the center of it all.” ― Robert M. Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance
